publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1140# Patricia Ferguson: 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils-That the Parliament notes that the year 2000 marks the 25th anniversary of the establishment of Scotland's local health councils, congratulates the staff and lay members who have served the public through these councils during that time and recognises the important role that the councils have played in giving the patient an effective voice in the decision making processes of the NHS.
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Cathie Craigie*, Scott Barrie*, Elaine Smith*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Marilyn Livingstone*

S1M-1140# Patricia Ferguson: 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils-That the Parliament notes that the year 2000 marks the 25th anniversary of the establishment of Scotland's local health councils, congratulates the staff and lay members who have served the public through these councils during that time and recognises the important role that the councils have played in giving the patient an effective voice in the decision making processes of the NHS. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Cathie Craigie, Scott Barrie, Elaine Smith, Marilyn Livingstone, Robin Harper*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Mr John Munro*, Rhoda Grant*, Malcolm Chisholm*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*, Johann Lamont*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Trish Godman*

S1M-1140# Patricia Ferguson: 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils-That the Parliament notes that the year 2000 marks the 25th anniversary of the establishment of Scotland's local health councils, congratulates the staff and lay members who have served the public through these councils during that time and recognises the important role that the councils have played in giving the patient an effective voice in the decision making processes of the NHS. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Cathie Craigie, Scott Barrie, Elaine Smith, Marilyn Livingstone, Robin Harper, Mr John Munro, Rhoda Grant, Malcolm Chisholm, Dr Elaine Murray, Johann Lamont, Tommy Sheridan, Trish Godman
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Helen Eadie*, Mr David Davidson*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-1140# Patricia Ferguson: 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils—That the Parliament notes that the year 2000 marks the 25th anniversary of the establishment of Scotland’s local health councils, congratulates the staff and lay members who have served the public through these councils during that time and recognises the important role that the councils have played in giving the patient an effective voice in the decision making processes of the NHS. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Cathie Craigie, Scott Barrie, Elaine Smith, Marilyn Livingstone, Robin Harper, Mr John Munro, Rhoda Grant, Malcolm Chisholm, Dr Elaine Murray, Johann Lamont, Tommy Sheridan, Trish Godman, Mary Scanlon, Helen Eadie, Mr David Davidson, Pauline McNeill, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Cathy Jamieson, Janis Hughes
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Dr Richard Simpson*, Des McNulty*
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Margaret Jamieson*, Euan Robson*

S1M-1140# Patricia Ferguson: 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils—That the Parliament notes that the year 2000 marks the 25th anniversary of the establishment of Scotland’s local health councils, congratulates the staff and lay members who have served the public through these councils during that time and recognises the important role that the councils have played in giving the patient an effective voice in the decision making processes of the NHS. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Cathie Craigie, Scott Barrie, Elaine Smith, Marilyn Livingstone, Robin Harper, Mr John Munro, Rhoda Grant, Malcolm Chisholm, Dr Elaine Murray, Johann Lamont, Tommy Sheridan, Trish Godman, Mary Scanlon, Helen Eadie, Mr David Davidson, Pauline McNeill, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Cathy Jamieson, Janis Hughes, Dr Richard Simpson, Des McNulty, Nora Radcliffe, Margaret Jamieson, Euan Robson
S1M-1140# 25th Anniversary of Establishment of Local Health Councils (lodged on 31 August 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
